DOC.brief_summary: Background : human study Chinese liquor sparse . hypothesis Chinese Tea Flavor liquor may beneficial CVD risk factor postprandially . Design : three-way crossover design one week wash time.16 young men include consume 60mL Chinese tea flavor liquor ( 45 % alcohol content ) , Chinese Meijiao liquor 45 % alcohol content ) water control.Blood sample collect fast , 0.5,1,2,4 hour postprandially . Tested serum index : lipid , glucose , insulin , hs-CRP , uric acid , liver function parameter .
DOC.brief_title: Postprandial Effect Chinese Tea Flavor Liquor Selected CVD Risk Factors
DOC.criteria: CVD history liver disease , healthy young men smoker
